law.catch_line: Short-term nursing home products subject to statutes.
law.text: Any short-term nursing home product issued on or after July 15, 2002, shall be subject to the provisions of this section and KRS 304.14-660, 304.14-665, 304.14-670 and 304.14-675.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 304, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002.
